InstructionData.Title: THST - Thermostat
InstructionData.Author: rotiking(warg)
InstructionData.Instructions: # Model TH-100​ alias Sensor d0​ alias Cooler d1​ alias Heater d2​ alias setpoint r0​ alias temperature r1​ alias differential r2​ alias maxtemp r3​ alias error r6​ alias t0 r10​ move setpoint 293.15​ move differential 1​ ​ justright:​ l temperature d0 Temperature​ #sub error setpoint temperature​ add maxtemp setpoint differential​ sgt t0 temperature maxtemp​ bgtz t0 toohot​ s Cooler On 0​ yield​ j justright​ ​ toohot:​ s Cooler On 1​ l temperature d0 Temperature​ sle t0 temperature setpoint​ bgtz t0 justright​ yield​ j toohot
